short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes instances of the word 'creemee' or 'creamee' to 'soft serve.'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes all instances of "creemee" or "creamee" to "soft serve." Please don't kick me out of Vermont for this. I really do like it here. It's just a silly word.
